description_txt: stated on December 15, 2011 in a web ad posted on YouTube:
quote_txt: Says Joe Biden said Jon Corzine is "the smartest guy that I know, in terms of the economy and on finance, I really mean this."

description_txt: stated on December 19, 2011 in a campaign event in Davenport, Iowa:
quote_txt: "No federal official at any level is currently allowed to say ‘Merry Christmas.’"

description_txt: stated on December 14, 2011 in a video ad:
quote_txt: Newt Gingrich "teamed with Nancy Pelosi and Al Gore on global warming."

description_txt: stated on December 5, 2011 in in direct mail:
quote_txt: "The fact is, over 2.4 million jobs have been lost since the 'Stimulus' bill was signed into law in February of 2009."

description_txt: stated on December 16, 2011 in a public forum:
quote_txt: "Hydrogen sulfide . . . [was] used in the genocide of Jews in Germany. "

description_txt: stated on December 12, 2011 in a letter:
quote_txt: "[E]xcise tax increases drive commerce across state lines."

description_txt: stated on December 12, 2011 in a speech:
quote_txt: Says Oregon canned blueberries will be cheaper in South Korea thanks to a trade agreement.

description_txt: stated on December 10, 2011 in a speech during a rally on homelessness:
quote_txt: "Rhode Island is leading our nation in foreclosures."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • December 20, 2011

description_txt: stated on December 18, 2011 in an interview on CBS' "Face the Nation":
quote_txt: In a watershed 1958 decision, "the Warren court asserted by itself that the Supreme Court was supreme over the president and the Congress."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2011 in a Republican presidential debate in Sioux City, Iowa:
quote_txt: Says Freddie Mac, electric co-ops and credit unions are all "government sponsored" enterprises.

description_txt: stated on December 14, 2011 in a speech welcoming home troops at Fort Bragg.:
quote_txt: Says President Obama "helped more than half a million veterans and military family members go to college through the Post-9/11 G.I. Bill."

description_txt: stated on December 6, 2011 in a Democratic Natonal Committee advertisement:
quote_txt: Says it cost Massachusetts taxpayers $100,000 when Mitt Romney and his staff purchased computer hard drives.

description_txt: stated on December 10, 2011 in a Republican presidential debate:
quote_txt: A study says Massachusetts has lost 18,000 jobs because residents were required to obtain health insurance under an act signed into law by Mitt Romney.

description_txt: stated on December 8, 2011 in a House Judiciary Committee hearing:
quote_txt: "I've done more impeachments than anybody else in the history of the country."

description_txt: stated on December 9, 2011 in a news release:
quote_txt: "Following the catastrophic, cascading collapse of major investment banks on Wall Street in 2007.....Nobody was prosecuted, no hearings were held and no reforms were implemented."

description_txt: stated on December 13, 2011 in a video:
quote_txt: "Wisconsin election officials to accept Mickey Mouse, Hitler signatures" on recall petitions.

description_txt: stated on December 6, 2011 in a telephone town hall meeting:
quote_txt: Says in 1944 "we were in debt more than twice as much as we are now."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2011 in Fox News Republican presidential debate in Sioux City, Iowa:
quote_txt: Says Texas did not bail out a loan program he oversaw as state agriculture commissioner.

description_txt: stated on December 7, 2011 in a debate.:
quote_txt: George Allen cast "the deciding vote" for the 2003 Bush tax cuts.

description_txt: stated on December 1, 2011 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says 77 percent "of Portland's students finish elementary school without taking even one art class."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2011 in a Republican presidential primary debate:
quote_txt: Says Newt Gingrich "made an affirmative statement that he would not only support but he would campaign for Republicans who were in support of the barbaric procedure known as partial-birth abortion."

name_txt: Oregon Department of Fish and Wildlife
description_txt: stated on December 12, 2011 in a news story:
quote_txt: Says there have been no cases of wolves killing people in Rocky Mountain states.

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2011 in a Republican presidential debate in Sioux City, Iowa:
quote_txt: "We’re $15 trillion now in debt, with a president that’s racked up as much debt as almost all of the other presidents combined."

description_txt: stated on December 8, 2011 in a news article:
quote_txt: Nevada has been recently ranked No. 1 in "unemployment, foreclosures, violent crime, personal bankruptcy and divorce."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2011 in a debate in Iowa:
quote_txt: "I never lobbied under any circumstance" for Freddie Mac.

description_txt: stated on December 6, 2011 in a Web video.:
quote_txt: "Traditionally, presidential candidates release their tax returns . . . Mitt Romney still won’t."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2011 in a Republican presidential primary debate:
quote_txt: "In this country … we have more natural gas than Saudi Arabia has oil."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2011 in a Republican presidential debate in Sioux City, Iowa:
quote_txt: "I balanced the budget for four straight years, paid off $405 billion in debt."

description_txt: stated on November 15, 2011 in an email blast:
quote_txt: Says King Street Patriots held a fundraiser featuring an author who believes that registering the poor to vote is un-American.

description_txt: stated on December 10, 2011 in a Republican presidential debate in Iowa.:
quote_txt: Says the Obama administration catches and releases nonviolent illegal immigrants.
